fields.name: Space Annihilation
fields.value:
• Harrison’s <Space Annihilation> skill will freeze enemy units within range and deal large damage to enemy units.
• Range: 7

fields.name: Passive Skill: Time Walker
fields.value: • Harrison will reduces the cooldown of active skills with each attack.

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Tea Party Time
fields.value:
• Upon death, awakened Harrison will trigger the <Tea Party Time> skill which revives himself and some of his troops.
• Trigger Number: 35/45/55/65/76
